amendment.description: An amendment numbered 27 printed in Part B of House Report 116-32 to provide for the inclusion of victim advocates/resources in state courts for urban American Indians/Alaskan Natives (AI/ANs) where 71 percent of the Native American population resides due to federal relocation and termination policies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Haaland amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A027) offered by Ms. Haaland.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Haaland amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
